amendment.description: Expressing the sense of the Senate that the Secretary of Defense should disburse funds to reward the provision of information leading to the resolution of the status of the members of the Armed Forces of the United States who remain missing in action.

vote.text: Amendment SA 759 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 759 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Nelson FL. (consideration: CR S6835-6836; text: CR S6835-6836) Expressing the sense of the Senate that the Secretary of Defense should disburse funds to reward the provision of information leading to the resolution of the status of the members of the Armed Forces of the United States who remain missing in action.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 759 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 759 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Nelson FL.
